pages.title: Chat Interface
pages.text: Right-click your companion to open the inventory, then click the Chat button to open the AI conversation screen.$(br2)Type natural language messages and your companion will respond using an AI language model (Groq cloud or local Ollama). The companion can execute in-game actions based on your requests.

pages.title: Multi-Part Commands
pages.text: You can give complex, multi-step instructions in a single message:$(br2)$(li)$(thing)"Mine some iron and then craft a pickaxe"$(br)$(li)$(thing)"Craft a chest and place it next to the furnace"$(br)$(li)$(thing)"Chop trees, make planks, then craft sticks"$(br2)The AI decomposes these into separate tool calls and chains them automatically. Simple commands like $(thing)"craft a bucket"$() still run instantly via local parsing.

pages.title: AI Tools (34)
pages.text: Your companion has $(bold)34 tools$() including:$(br2)$(li)Mine ores, strip mine, create permanent mines$(li)Craft items (full autonomous chain)$(li)Smelt at furnaces$(li)Build structures$(li)Farm, chop trees, gather blocks$(li)Fish, trade with villagers$(li)Kill mobs, guard areas$(li)Deliver items, interact with containers$(li)Search the web, bookmark locations$(li)Remember facts, perform emotes$(li)Execute game commands, scan surroundings
